This guide is a simplified overview of all the changes in the {{BE}} 0.11.x releases, which assumes at least some familiarity with ''Bedrock Edition'' 0.10.x releases.

===New===
{| {{Simple Guide table|New Non-mob entities}}
|-
|[[Boat]]
|{{Animate|Oak_Boat_JE2_BE1.png; Spruce_Boat_JE1_BE1.png; Birch_Boat_JE1_BE1.png; Jungle_Boat_JE1_BE1.png; Acacia_Boat_JE1_BE1.png; Dark_Oak_Boat_JE1_BE1.png|128px}}

|A3= Matching Overworld Planks |B3= Matching Overworld Planks |C3= Matching Overworld Planks
|Output= Matching Boat
|type= Transportation
}}
|
* {{ItemLink|Boat}}
|
* Will emit smoke when destroyed.
* Size slightly larger than {{el|je}}.
*Color depends on the wood board used.
* The color of the icon is always the same. Does not change based on the actual color of the ship.
* More resistant to damage: the ship will not be damaged when colliding with other blocks.
* Can carry 2 passengers, including all creatures.
* Passive and hostile mobs can ride on ships without players.
|-

==Gameplay==
===New===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Gameplay}}
|-
|[[Status Effect]]
|
* The corresponding potion was added to the game after the Nether was added.
*{{EffectSprite|Poison revision 1}} [[Poison]]
** Obtained by eating [[rotten Flesh]], [[raw chicken]] and [[pufferfish]].
* {{EffectSprite|Nausea revision 1}} [[Nausea]]
** Can only be obtained by eating pufferfish.
* {{EffectSprite|Hunger revision 1}} [[Hunger (status effect)|Hunger]]
**Can only be obtained by eating raw chicken.
** Has no effect on [[player]].
* Through inventory editing, all status effects of the player, such as [[Health Boost]] and [[Absorption|Damage Absorption]], can be affected and function normally. However, hunger and saturation effects do not work, which is caused by the lack of hunger value.
|-
|[[Death]] information
|Ported from {{el|je}}.
|-
|[[Fishing]]
|By using a [[fishing rod]].
|}

===Changed===
{| {{Simple Guide table|Changed Gameplay}}
|-
|[[Creative mode]]
|
* Increase the interactive distance in creative mode.
* Completely remove player burning animation.
|}
